Failure The creature takes full damage and is clumsy 1 for 1 round as its body stiffens.

Critical Failure You deal double void damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 1 round and clumsy 1 for 1 minute as its body becomes as rigid as a corpse.

Level (+2) The persistent damage increases by 1d4.

Rime Nexus.name: Rime Nexus
Rime Nexus.description: As you redraw and refresh patterns of ice elemental energy, frozen fractals of chill ice and snowflake patterns spread across the ground, making the ground within 30 feet of you (@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]) difficult terrain until your choice of the beginning of your next turn, or the beginning of your turn after that. You Refresh your powers.

Rock Cover.name: Rock Cover
Rock Cover.description:
You draw rock around yourself, refreshing your earth energy while providing yourself and your allies cover. You gain greater cover, granting you a +4 circumstance bonus to AC, Reflex saves, and Stealth, though you can't use this cover to Hide or Sneak, since the cover clearly surrounds you and your position is obvious.

Additionally, you provide standard cover, rather than lesser cover, against attacks from your foes that pass through your space, and you manipulate the rock in order to provide no cover against attacks from your allies that pass through your space. All these effects last until the beginning of your next turn. You Refresh your powers.

Rock Shield.name: Rock Shield
Rock Shield.description:
Requirements You are standing on a solid surface.

Trigger A creature targets you with an attack and you can see the attacker.

Just before your foe attacks, you instantly call forth a shield of earth from the ground to block the attack. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to your AC against the triggering attack roll. After the triggering attack roll, this AC bonus reduces by 1; it lasts until the beginning of your next turn or until it reduces to 0, whichever comes first.

Rock and Roll.name: Rock and Roll
Rock and Roll.description:
You transform into a giant boulder and roll up to @Template[type:line|distance:20]{20 feet in a straight line}, bowling over enemies in your way, then transform back. Foes in your path take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[bludgeoning]] damage, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. On a critical failure, they're also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Your movement as a giant boulder triggers reactions as normal, but you have a +4 circumstance bonus to AC and Hardness equal to twice your level against such reactions while you're a boulder.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.Y91rsRryHHVgX6n5]{Effect: Rock and Roll}

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Rockfall.name: Rockfall
Rockfall.description:
You make rocks fall from above, bringing death to everyone who dares to stand against you. The rocks fall in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] around you, leaving you and your allies miraculously unharmed as they deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[bludgeoning]] damage to each foe in the area, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. The rocks continue falling until the end of your turn, providing you and your allies in the area greater cover until then. The rocks remain on the ground in the area, making it difficult terrain until you refresh.

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d8.

Roots of the Ancient Oak.name: Roots of the Ancient Oak
Roots of the Ancient Oak.description:
You surround yourself with an enormous field of roots, damaging foes and either sowing or harvesting to trip them. Foes within an @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{emanation up to 60 feet} take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: You sow in the area.
  • Harvest: You harvest in the area. Foes in a harvested square who succeed (but don't critically succeed) at their Reflex save are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the beginning of their next turn, foes who fail become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, and those who critically fail become prone and are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round or until they @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} against your power DC.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Rush of Insight.name: Rush of Insight
Rush of Insight.description: You send a rush of mental energy through yourself and around you, allowing you to rapidly inspect your surroundings and query your memories or those of the friend whose phase you share while you rearrange the energy to use your powers again. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} three times, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} three times, or use any combination of the two three times. If you're an eldamon, your mortal friend Recalls Knowledge instead of you. You Refresh your powers.

Rushing Current.name: Rushing Current
Rushing Current.description:
You create a wide current, which smashes your foes and makes it difficult to move against the current. The current is a @Template[type:line|distance:60|width:15] 15 feet wide. Foes within the area when you use the power take @Damage[(max((1+@actor.level),10))d6[bludgeoning]] damage, depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Moving against the current within its area (toward you if you use Rushing Current in high tide, or away from you if you use Rushing Torrent in low tide) is difficult terrain for 1 round.

High Tide: The damage is @Damage[(max((1+@actor.level),10))d8[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage, but you take a -2 penalty to Reflex saves until the end of your next turn.

Low Tide: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves until the end of your next turn.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and you move them 5 feet.

Failure The foe takes full damage and you move them 10 feet.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and you move them 20 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.bIefoFLc8f59bJl6]{Effect: Rushing Current (High Tide)}

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.jAKO8B23405V0St9]{Effect: Rushing Current (Low Tide)}

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6, or 1d8 on high tide.

Rushing Embrace.name: Rushing Embrace
Rushing Embrace.description:
You surround yourself in blades of wind in order to slash all those who dare attack you. Until you refresh, adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch you or hit you with an unarmed attack, take @Damage[@actor.level[slashing]] damage. If you moved at least 40 feet on your last turn, you surge up the winds, increasing the slashing damage by half your level.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1.

Rushing Refresh.name: Rushing Refresh
Rushing Refresh.description: You carry yourself around on gusts of air, collecting air energy as you move and shaping it to refresh your powers. Stride up to three times. You Refresh your powers.

Sea Spray.name: Sea Spray
Sea Spray.description:
You spray water unpredictably in a cone, throwing yourself offbalance, or draw the spray back toward you to defend yourself. You deal @Damage[(max((1+@actor.level),2))d4[bludgeoning]] damage to each foe in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

At 5th level, you can choose to increase the size of the cone to a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] when you use Sea Spray, and every 4 levels thereafter you can increase the size of the cone by 5 additional feet, to a maximum of 35 feet at 17th level.

High Tide: The damage is @Damage[(max((1+@actor.level),2))d6[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until your next turn.

Low Tide: You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn, which increases to a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against creatures that didn't critically succeed on their saving throw against the Sea Spray, and a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against creatures that critically failed their saving throw against the Sea Spray.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.bpmehE1sbwNKRKzN]{Effect: Sea Spray (Low Tide)}

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and you move them 10 feet.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and you move them 20 feet.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4, or 1d6 on high tide.

Shadow Betrayal.name: Shadow Betrayal
Shadow Betrayal.description:
You take control of a creature's shadow within 60 feet, causing it to betray the one who cast it and continue attacking and hindering them. When you use Shadow Betrayal and then again at the beginning of each of your turns, the shadow makes an attack roll, using your @Check[type:eldamon|defense:ac]{power attack modifier}, dealing @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[cold]] damage.

The attacks continue until you Refresh, the target Escapes from the treacherous shadow against your power DC, or the shadow critically fails an attack roll, whichever comes first, at which point any conditions from Shadow Betrayal end immediately as well. The shadow's attack rolls don't use or contribute to your multiple attack penalty.

When the creature is shrouded, the shadow gains a circumstance bonus to damage rolls against them equal to their shrouded condition's value.

Critical Success The shadow deals double damage and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round by their shadow's grasp.

Success The shadow deals full damage and the target takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as the shadow restricts their movement.

Failure The shadow isn't able to damage the target but still takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as the shadow restricts their movement.

Critical Failure The shadow's attack fails completely, and the target is able to escape its treacherous grasp entirely.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.CzrDbs6LG3DW1Ams]{Effect: Shadow Betrayal}

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Shadowstorm.name: Shadowstorm
Shadowstorm.description:
You call forth a storm of dancing shadows that damages creatures and covers the area with shadow. The storm fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Foes that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[cold]] damage and the area is obscured in dim light if it otherwise would have been in bright light. When in the area, you and allies don't take the damage from Shadowstorm.

Unlike normal dim light, a Shadowstorm combines with the @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} condition to shroud the creature in darkness (making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} except to creatures with darkvision and unable to see unless it has darkvision). The storm lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes cold damage from Shadowstorm once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area.

Shared Vitality.name: Shared Vitality
Shared Vitality.description:
You connect all your allies to a shared reservoir of vitality, protecting them all from harm. You and all allies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] when you use Shared Vitality gain a special reservoir of temporary Hit Points, which contains 5 temporary Hit Points plus 5 temporary Hit Points for every level you have. This special reservoir of temporary Hit Points is shared among you and all those allies, and since it exists in a separate reservoir, it is cumulative with normal temporary Hit Points. Temporary Hit Points are lost from the reservoir first, before any individual creature loses their temporary or actual Hit Points.

If an effect damages multiple affected creatures at once and would deal more damage between the creatures than there are temporary Hit Points in the reservoir, you choose how to distribute the reservoir between all affected creatures. The reservoir lasts until you refresh.

Shifting Ground.name: Shifting Ground
Shifting Ground.description:
Requirements You are standing on a solid surface.

You shift the ground below, rearranging it to refresh your earth powers and throw your foes off-balance. You Refresh your powers. Foes within your reach that are standing on the same solid surface are affected depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] saves.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn or until it uses an action to stabilize its footing, whichever comes first.

Critical Failure The creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Shining Guidance.name: Shining Guidance
Shining Guidance.description:
You call forth a guiding light to surround your foe and guide your attacks toward them. Choose a foe within 40 feet. You deal @Damage[((2+@actor.level)d4+(ceil(@actor.level/2)))[fire]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success You deal half fire damage to the foe, and the foe is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned} until the end of your next turn. You can choose to deal no fire damage to the foe instead of half damage; if you choose to do so, you and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus on attack rolls against the foe until the end of your next turn, as long as it remains limned.

Failure You deal full fire damage to the foe, and the foe is limned until the end of your next turn. During that time, as long as it remains limned, you and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus on attack rolls against the foe.

Critical Failure You deal double fire damage to the foe, and the foe is limned until the end of your turn after next (for 2 rounds and then until the end of your turn). During that time, as long as it remains limned, you and your allies gain a +1 circumstance bonus on attack rolls against the foe.

Level (+1) The damage increased by 1d4.
Level (+2) The normal damage increases by 1.

Shocking Curtain.name: Shocking Curtain
Shocking Curtain.description:
You trace an curtain of electricity across the battlefield, electrocuting those who cross it. You create a 5-foot thick curtain of electricity up to 10 feet high and up to @Template[type:line|distance:40]{40 feet} long in a straight line, calling forth the curtain within 120 feet. Any creature that crosses the curtain or is occupying the curtain's area at the start of its turn takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[electricity]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} for 1 round. The curtain lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes electricity damage from Shocking Curtain once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the curtain and then crosses the curtain, or crosses the curtain several times.

Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d12[electricity]] damage and increase the maximum length of the curtain to @Template[type:line|distance:80]{80 feet}.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1d12 on a discharge.

Sicken Unto Death.name: Sicken Unto Death
Sicken Unto Death.description:
You infuse concentrated death energy into a creature, sickening it as necrotic energies flood through its body. Choose a creature within 30 feet. The creature takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d4[persistent,void]] damage and might become sickened, with effects depending on the creature's Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half the persistent void damage and isn't sickened. In addition to the normal flat checks, they can remove the persistent damage by retching, as a single action, and succeeding at a Fortitude save against your power DC (similarly to the sickened condition).

Failure The creature takes full persistent void damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. If it recovers from the sickened condition, the persistent damage ends.

Critical Failure The creature takes double persistent void damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}. If it recovers from the sickened condition, the persistent damage ends.

Level (+2) The persistent damage increases by 1d4.

Sink Into the Dark.name: Sink Into the Dark
Sink Into the Dark.description:
Trigger A creature succeeds at a Perception check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} you and you would become observed by that creature.

Requirements You are shrouded and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or undetected to the creature.

Just when a creature is about to observe you, you sink into your shroud of darkness to shake off their notice. Just as the creature catches a glimpse of you, you attempt to [[/act hide]], with a +2 status bonus on your check.

Siphon Vitality.name: Siphon Vitality
Siphon Vitality.description:
You siphon away the vital essence from creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60]. Creatures in the area take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[void]] damage, and they might be drained, depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature resists most of your siphoning. It takes half damage and isn't drained.

Failure You siphon away some of the creature's vitality. It takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Critical Failure You siphon away much of the creature's vitality. It takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Slippery Ice.name: Slippery Ice
Slippery Ice.description:
Trigger A foe with either the cold trait or the frozen condition within 60 feet Strides (or makes another move action across the ground, such as Crawling)

You alter the ice freezing a creature, melting and refreezing it to create a slick and potentially tripping the creature. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save with the following effects.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature maintains its balance but is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the beginning of its next turn unless it spends an action stabilizing itself.

Failure The creature slips and slides through its movement and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} at the end of its movement.

Critical Failure The creature falls over immediately, falling prone at the beginning of its movement and disrupting the movement.

Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
Solar Flare.description:
You call an intense storm of flaring light that damages and shines upon creatures in the area. The storm fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Foes that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[fire]] damage and the area is covered in bright light.

Creatures in the area are limned and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} as long as they remain in the area. The storm lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes fire damage from Solar Flare once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Soothing Recovery.name: Soothing Recovery
Soothing Recovery.description:
You release a field of life energy into your nearby allies, soothing them and helping them recover from ongoing harm. You end all persistent damage affecting your living allies within 30 feet. The soothing energy clings to those allies for a brief time. They gain 1 temporary Hit Point for each level you have, which last until the next time you refresh.

Until the next time you refresh, if they roll a success on an ongoing saving throw against a poison or disease, they get a critical success instead.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.AACuMXNhDoto9kms]{Effect: Soothing Recovery}

Spasmodic Shock.name: Spasmodic Shock
Spasmodic Shock.description:
You send an electric charge coursing through a foe's nervous system, leading to spasms that affect the creature's coordination. Choose a foe within 120 feet. You deal the creature @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[electricity]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[electricity]] damage. If you discharge, the clumsy condition increases to 2 on a success, 3 on a failure, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 4} on a critical failure. 

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}; both conditions last for 1 round.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is shocked and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}; both conditions last for 3 rounds.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is shocked and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 3}; both conditions last for 1 minute.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4, damage on discharge increases by 1d8.

Spike Seeds.name: Spike Seeds
Spike Seeds.description:
You release a line of spiky seeds to pierce your foes. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[piercing]] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:line|distance:30], with effects depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

At 3rd level, you can choose to increase the size of the line to a @Template[type:line|distance:35] when you use Spike Seeds, and every 2 levels thereafter you can increase the size of the line by 5 additional feet, to a maximum of 75 feet at 19th level.

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: The spike seeds grow into plants. You sow in all squares in the area. 
  • Harvest: You harvest plants in the area, causing them to explode with numerous spike seeds. Creatures with harvested plants in their space take additional piercing damage equal to 2 plus twice your level.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Spray of Rampant Leaves.name: Spray of Rampant Leaves
Spray of Rampant Leaves.description:
You fling forth a cone of rampant leaves, piercing your foes and either sowing new plants or harvesting them to create explosions. Creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] damage with effects depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: You sow in the area.
  • Harvest: You harvest in the area, causing miniature explosions of additional leaves. You can cause any squares you harvest to explode in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]. Creatures other than you in any of the explosion areas take the power's damage depending on their Reflex save. A creature is only damaged by this power once, even if it's in the main area and one or more explosions.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Static Shock.name: Static Shock
Static Shock.description:
You create an electric potential on the surface of your body and then touch a foe, releasing a static shock. You deal @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[electricity]] damage to a touched foe. The results depend on your @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll}. Choose one:

  • You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged},
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d12[electricity]].

Critical Success You deal double electricity damage and the foe becomes @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} for 2 rounds.

Success You deal normal electricity damage and the foe becomes shocked until the end of your next turn.

Failure Your touch misses, but some of the electricity crosses the distance, and a small charge still transfers to the target. They take @Damage[(2+@actor.level)[electricity]] electricity damage and become shocked until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure Your touch misses completely, and the target is unharmed.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, damage on discharge increases by 1d12.

Steal Breath.name: Steal Breath
Steal Breath.description:
You breathe in, drawing in the life force of nearby creatures. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[void]] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], with effects depending on their Fortitude save.

At 9th level, you can choose to increase the size of the cone to a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] when you use Steal Breath, and at 17th level, you can instead choose to increase the size of the cone to a maximum of a @Template[type:cone|distance:25].

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature struggles but maintains its life force, taking half damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} on the next attack it makes before the end of its next turn.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is enfeebled 1 for 1 round, as you draw away some of its strength.

Critical Failure You deal double void damage, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round and enfeebled 1 for 1 minute as you draw away much of its strength.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Stiffening Pine Shot.name: Stiffening Pine Shot
Stiffening Pine Shot.description:
You fire a barrage of pine needles at a foe, either sowing around them or harvesting nearby plants to stiffen the foe's body. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{ranged power attack roll} against a foe within 60 feet, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] damage.

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: On any result except a critical failure, you sow in a 10-foot emanation around the foe's space, including the foe's space.
  • Harvest: You harvest in the foe's space or from a space adjacent to the foe. The foe becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 round on a failure (but not a critical failure), clumsy 1 for 2 rounds on a success, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for 2 rounds on a critical success.

Critical Success You deal double piercing damage to the target.

Success You deal normal piercing damage to the target.

Failure You deal no damage, but your shot still has an effect depending on whether you sowed or harvested.

Critical Failure Your shot misses completely.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Stupefying Embrace.name: Stupefying Embrace
Stupefying Embrace.description:
You surround yourself with a thin aura of mental energy, stupefying foes who come in contact with you. Until you refresh, adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch you or hit you with an unarmed attack, become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the beginning of their next turn and takes @Damage[(@actor.level)[mental]] damage.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1.

Stupefying Inception.name: Stupefying Inception
Stupefying Inception.description:
You touch a foe and release overflowing mental energy into their vulnerable mind, damaging them and briefly weakening their mind. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll} against a foe within your reach, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d8[mental]] damage.

Critical Success You deal double mental damage and the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} until the end of your next turn.

Success You deal normal mental damage and the foe is stupefied 2 until the end of your next turn.

Failure The foe manages to fight off the mental damage, but their mind is still briefly weakened. They are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure Your touch misses completely, and the foe is unaffected.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Sunlight Ray.name: Sunlight Ray
Sunlight Ray.description:
You emit a ray of sunlight and send it hurtling at your foe, attracted toward their light. Make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{ranged power attack roll} against a foe within 60 feet, dealing @Damage[((2+@actor.level)d4+(ceil(@actor.level/2)))[fire]] damage.

At 7th level, and every 4 levels thereafter, your ray's range increases by 30 feet, to a maximum of 180 feet at 19th level.

If the foe is limned, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the attack.

Critical Success You deal double fire damage to the target and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} and @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned} until the end of your turn after next (for 2 rounds and then until the end of your turn).

Success You deal normal fire damage to the target and the target is dazzled and limned until the end of your next turn.

Failure The ray misses but still limns the target. The target is dazzled and limned until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure The ray misses completely

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Superbolt.name: Superbolt
Superbolt.description:
You bring down an incredibly powerful bolt of lightning from the heavens, stunning foes along its path. The superbolt strikes down in a vertical cylinder with a radius of 5 feet and your choice of height up to 200 feet. The bolt must strike the ground within 200 feet of you. Creatures in the area take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[electricity]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[electricity]] damage. If you discharge, creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} on a failure and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4} on a critical failure.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1d8 on discharge.

Supercell.name: Supercell
Supercell.description:
You call forth an extremely powerful lightning storm that electrocutes creatures in the area. The storm fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 120 feet of you. Creatures that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[electricity]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} until the end of your next turn. The storm lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes electricity damage from Supercell once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area.

Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged}
  • You discharge to increase the damage to @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[electricity]] damage. If you discharge, you can choose to increase the radius of the storm to either 25 feet or 30 feet.

Level (+1) The damage on discharge increases by 1d6.

Level (+2) The normal damage increases by 1d6.

Supercharge.name: Supercharge
Supercharge.description:
You either gain or expel a huge amount of electric charge at once. Choose one:

  • You either become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Bi2aHykg6CZrQCnR]{Charged} three times
  • You discharge at least once, and up to three times.

If you choose to become charged, this power has no other effects. If you choose to discharge once, foes within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[electricity]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save, and they become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} for 1 round on a failed save.

If you choose to discharge twice, foes within @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d10[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save, and they become shocked for 2 rounds on a failed save.

If you choose to discharge three times, foes within @Template[type:emanation|distance:90]{90 feet} take an amount of @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d12 + @actor.level)[electricity]] damage with a basic Reflex save, and they become shocked for 3 rounds on a failed save.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8 when discharging, or 1d10 when discharging twice, or 1d12+1 when discharging three times.

Symplegades.name: Symplegades
Symplegades.description:
You call forth clashing chunks of force energy in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] that slam into each other and foes in the area, dealing damage and repositioning them where you please. At the end of each of your turns, the chunks of force clash against each other, dealing @Damage[(@actor.level)d4[force]] damage to each foe in the area, with effects depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] saves, and allowing you to reposition allies up to 20 feet without harming them. The clashing force lasts until you refresh.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and you can't reposition them.

Failure The foe takes full damage, and you can reposition them up to 10 feet.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage, and you can reposition them up to 20 feet.

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d4.

Tempest.name: Tempest
Tempest.description:
You call forth a razor sharp tempest of wind that blows across the area, cutting your enemies apart. The tempest fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:20] within 500 feet of you. Foes that enter or start their turn in the area take @Damage[ceil(@actor.level/2)d6[slashing]] damage, Flying in the area is difficult terrain for your foes, and your foes's physical ranged attacks that pass through the area take a –2 circumstance penalty to their attack rolls unless they use unusually massive projectiles. The tempest lasts until you refresh. A creature only takes slashing damage from Tempest once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the area and then enters the area.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Tendrils of Shade.name: Tendrils of Shade
Tendrils of Shade.description:
You send forth tendrils of shade in a cone to chill your foes and shroud yourself. You deal an amount of cold damage equal to @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4 +ceil(@actor.level /2))[cold]] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save, and then you become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of your next turn.

At 5th level, you can choose to increase the size of the cone to a @Template[type:cone|distance:20] when you use Tendrils of Shade, and every 4 levels thereafter you can increase the size of the cone by 5 additional feet, to a maximum of 35 feet at 17th level. If you're shrouded, you can extend the tendrils by up to 10 additional feet (25 feet at 1st level, 45 feet at 17th level).

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1.

Tezcatlipoca.name: Tezcatlipoca
Tezcatlipoca.description: You call forth a mythical jaguar of obsidian darkness, slashing through all your foes with hundreds of obsidian claws and leaching away their light. Creatures you choose within 200 feet take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[cold]] damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save, and those that fail their save are @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.Item.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of your next turn.

Thanatos.name: Thanatos
Thanatos.description:
You call upon an embodiment of death, the reaper of all life, to slay all who oppose you. Everything fades into white, as a skeletal figure descends upon your enemies.

Creatures you choose within 200 feet take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[void]] damage, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and must attempt a second @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|traits:incapacitation] save. On a failure, they instantly die. This second Fortitude save is a death and incapacitation effect.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Throw Everything.name: Throw Everything
Throw Everything.description:
If there was an unattended object nearby that you didn't fling, it's just because you didn't notice it. You throw everything. Make @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{power attack rolls} against any number of creatures within 60 feet as you pummel them with various objects, dealing @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[untyped]] damage, of whichever of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage is most advantageous, depending on your power attack roll.

Since you're throwing so many different objects, special materials like silver or adamantine typically don't apply (unlike the Object Throw power), though at the GM's discretion if you are surrounded by only objects of one material, they might apply.

Don't apply your multiple attack penalty until after all the attacks.

Critical Success The creature takes double damage.

Success The creature takes full damage.

Failure The creature takes half damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes no damage.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Tornado.name: Tornado
Tornado.description:
You call up a brief but powerful tornado, spinning around and rending your foes while safely maneuvering yourself and your allies. The tornado spins in a @Template[type:burst|distance:40] within 120 feet. Foes in the area take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[slashing]], with results depending on their @Check[type:Fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save. You can move willing allies in the area (and yourself, if you're in the area) to any space in the area the same distance from the center of the area as their original space. For instance, if an ally was 30 feet south of the center of the area, you could spin them to be 30 feet northwest of the center of the area instead. This doesn't move them vertically.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected by the tornado.

Success The tornado makes a few incidental cuts, but the foe withstands the worst of it. The foe takes half damage from the tornado.

Failure The tornado cuts into the foe and carries them along. The foe takes full damage from the tornado and you can move them up to 10 feet to a space the same distance from the center of the area as their original space. This doesn't move them vertically.

Critical Failure The tornado cuts deeply into the foe as it picks them up and spins them around and around. The foe takes double damage from the tornado and you can move them to any space the same distance from the center of the area as their original space. This doesn't move them vertically.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Trail Blaze.name: Trail Blaze
Trail Blaze.description:
You alight with flame, rushing forward and leaving behind a trail of fire to burn your foes. You either Stride or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.21WIfSu7Xd7uKqV8]{Tumble Through}, leaving behind flames in any space you enter during the movement, which last until the end of your next turn.

Creatures who start their turn in the flames or pass through the flames take @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[fire]] damage. A creature only takes fire damage from Trail Blaze once, even if it starts its turn in the fire and then crosses the fire, or crosses the fire several times.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Tremor Stomp.name: Tremor Stomp
Tremor Stomp.description:
Requirements You are standing on a solid surface

You stomp and infuse earth energy into the ground, creating a localized tremor. You deal @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]] damage to all creatures standing on the same solid surface in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5], with effects depending on their Fortitude save.

At 9th level, you can choose to increase the size of the emanation to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] when you use Tremor Stomp, and at 17th level, you can also choose to increase it to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15].

Critical Success The creature is unaffected

Success The creature takes half damage and their footing is unsteady, causing them to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the beginning of their next turn.

Failure The creature takes full damage and their footing is unsteady, causing them to become off-guard until the beginning of their next turn. It takes a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. It takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you for 1 round.

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6.

Umbral Call.description:
You call forth darkness you can use to refresh your darkness powers. You Refresh your powers.

Then the area in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] around you becomes darkness until the end of your next turn. Light doesn't enter the area and any non-magical light sources, such as a torch or lantern, don't emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the area. Magical light can attempt to counteract the darkness as normal. Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside without darkvision. From outside, the area of darkness appears as a sphere of pure darkness.
Umbral Call.name: Umbral Call

Umbral Curtain.name: Umbral Curtain
Umbral Curtain.description:
You trace a curtain of darkness across the battlefield, enshrouding those who cross it. You create a 5-foot thick curtain of darkness up to 10 feet high and up to @Template[type:line|distance:60]{60 feet} long in a straight line, calling forth the curtain within 120 feet. The curtain is dark and blocks light; only creatures with darkvision can see the other side of the curtain.

Any creature that crosses the curtain or is occupying the curtain's area at the start of its turn takes @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[cold]] damage and become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of its next turn. The curtain lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes cold damage from Umbral Curtain once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the curtain and then crosses the curtain, or crosses the curtain several times.

Level (+2) The damage is increased by 1d6.

Unrelenting Jet.name: Unrelenting Jet
Unrelenting Jet.description:
You call forth an orb of water that fires a continuous jet against a foe, attempting to prevent it from approaching or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}. You deal @Damage[(max((1+@actor.level),6))d4[bludgeoning]] damage to a single foe within 60 feet, with effects depending on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

High Tide: The damage is @Damage[(max((1+@actor.level),6))d8[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage, but you take a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Low Tide: The target takes a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn unless they critically succeed at their saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage and moving against the jet (toward you for high tide, or away from you for low tide) is difficult terrain for them for 1 round.

Failure The target takes full damage, you move the target 5 feet, and moving against the jet (toward you for high tide, or away from you for low tide) is greater difficult terrain for them for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, you move the target 10 feet, and it can't move against the jet (toward you for high tide, or away from you for low tide) for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.s7OtrwAXwaGWVT10]{Effect: Unrelenting Jet (High Tide)}

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.Be68woo4zufVqnxc]{Effect: Unrelenting Jet (Low Tide)}

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1d4, or 1d8 on high tide.

Vajra.name: Vajra
Vajra.description:
You call forth a legendary indestructible and irresistible lightning bolt and thrust it forward at your foes, releasing a massive bolt. All foes in a @Template[type:line|distance:2000|width:30]{30-foot wide line up to 2,000 feet long} are electrocuted, taking @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[electricity]] damage.

This electricity damage is truly irresistible. It ignores resistance, and even creatures immune to electricity are affected, taking force damage instead of electricity damage.

Creatures can't dodge the lightning, and their bodies can't hope to withstand it, but an unbreakable will allows a foe to deny the lightning bolt's legend and mitigate the effects. The results depend on the foe's @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The electricity might be irresistible, but the foe's will is so unassailable that they only take minor damage. The foe takes @Damage[ (floor(@actor.level/2))[electricity]] damage.

Success The foe takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.1fZbuJEbVmE3J4XL]{Shocked} for 2 rounds.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is shocked for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The foe takes double damage and is shocked for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Vanishing Silhouette.name: Vanishing Silhouette
Vanishing Silhouette.description:
You send forth a silhouette of darkness that resembles your own shadow, while shrouding yourself and immediately hiding as the silhouette distracts your target. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[cold]] damage to a creature within 120 feet, with effects depending on your @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{ranged power attack roll}. You become @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.SXQzSmgPZv0IFSlN]{Shrouded 1} until the end of your next turn and then you Hide.

Critical Success The creature takes double cold damage.

Success The creature takes full cold damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(1+@actor.level)[cold]] cold damage.

Critical Failure The silhouette misses completely.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6, or 1 on a failure.

Vengeful Backlash.name: Vengeful Backlash
Vengeful Backlash.description:
Requirements You are standing on a solid surface

You circulate earth energy within yourself, ready to send shockwaves of backlash that punish those who dare to harm you with an equal but opposite reaction, even reverberating through their weapons. Until the beginning of your next turn (or until you are no longer standing on a solid surface, whichever comes first), all creatures that hit you with melee Strikes take bludgeoning damage from Vengeful Backlash equal to the result of their damage roll, before doubling the damage for a critical hit or adjusting for resistance, weakness, or the like.

While this effect lasts, you can choose to give yourself a circumstance penalty to AC against your foes' attacks, up to a maximum penalty of –4, in order to take more hits; you can select the penalty separately against each attack.

If no creatures hit you with melee Strikes while Vengeful Backlash is active, on your next turn, if you use a damaging earth power without a duration, that power deals additional @Damage[@actor.level[bludgeoning]] damage.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.EPPZVNLm4W9qwQAB]{Effect: Vengeful Backlash}

Level (+1) The damage is increased by 1.

Vine Infestation.name: Vine Infestation
Vine Infestation.description:
You cause thorns and vines to infest a foe's body, continually piercing them and either sowing plants around them or harvesting to increase the damage and restrict their movement. Choose a foe within 60 feet. They take @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d4[persistent,piercing]] damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Choose to either sow or harvest.

Sow: You sow in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] around your target, now and each time they take the persistent piercing damage, as the vines grow out of them and onto the ground around them.

Harvest: You harvest either in the foe's space or in an adjacent square to increase the infestation's effects. The persistent damage increases by 1 for every two levels you have (rounded up), and while the persistent damage lasts the foe takes a circumstance penalty to their Speeds depending on the result of their saving throw; a –5-foot circumstance penalty on a success, a –10-foot circumstance penalty on a failure, and a –20 foot circumstance penalty on a critical failure.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.Ze09I0NqNmXbfe6A]{Effect: Vine Infestation}

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d4.

Vital Breath.name: Vital Breath
Vital Breath.description:
You breathe out a cone of vibrant life energy, providing living creatures in the area with renewed vigor. Choose to breathe life energy in a cone of your choice of size from 15 feet to 60 feet. Living creatures in the cone gain 1d4 temporary Hit Points plus 1d4 temporary Hit Points for every level you have) and gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls for 1 round. The temporary Hit Points last until you refresh. Undead creatures in the cone take @Damage[(4+(@actor.level*4))[vitality]] damage, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save. On a failure, undead are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round, and on a critical failure, they're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.blkufFGRhvUBVIjL]{Effect: Vital Breath}

Level (+1) The damage increases by 4.

Vital Collapse.name: Vital Collapse
Vital Collapse.description:
You collapse an existing bundle of life force into an explosion that harms nearby foes. Choose yourself or an ally within 60 feet; your choice of target must have temporary Hit Points from one of your life powers. You remove all the target's temporary Hit Points, and the life energy explosively collapses.

This deals @Damage[(@actor.level@actor.system.attributes.hp.temp)[vitality]]{vitality damage} or @Damage[(@actor.level+@actor.system.attributes.hp.temp)[force]]{force damage} (whichever is better in each individual case) equal to your level plus the number of temporary Hit Points from your life powers to all of the target's foes within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10], with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Vital Collapse does not interact with the special reservoir of temporary Hit Points from Shared Vitality.

Vital Sacrifice.name: Vital Sacrifice
Vital Sacrifice.description:
Trigger A foe damages an ally, and the ally is within 30 feet of you.

You connect your life force to your ally, protecting them from harm, though not without cost for yourself. You heal your ally simultaneously as they receive the damage, for @Damage[(1+@actor.level)[healing]], an amount equal to 1 plus your level, or the total damage, whichever is lower. This effectively reduces the total damage by that amount. If there is any damage remaining, you lose an amount of Hit Points equal to 1 plus your level, or the remaining damage, whichever is lower, and you further reduce the damage to your ally by that amount. Any damage that still remains applies to your ally as normal.

Vital Singularity.name: Vital Singularity
Vital Singularity.description:
You combine yourself and several allies into a single amalgam of life force, distributing the shared vital energy however you see fit. Choose up to three non-minion allies of your level or higher within 40 feet of you (they don't all need to be within 40 feet of each other). You and the allies you chose momentarily merge into a singularity of life energy and then instantly separate.

When you separate, you and the allies can choose to switch positions with each other. You can distribute the Hit Points of yourself and the allies however you choose, except that no one can receive fewer than 1 Hit Point or more than their maximum Hit Points. This redistribution of Hit Points only affects actual Hit Points, not temporary Hit Points.

Afterward, you each gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level until the next time you refresh.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.DIPLUKPytQCW6kFc]{Effect: Vital Singularity}

Vital Touch.name: Vital Touch
Vital Touch.description:
Your touch infuses surging life force into a creature, healing the living and harming the undead. Touch a living creature within your reach or make a melee power attack roll against an undead creature within your reach to attempt to touch it. A living target gains 6 temporary Hit Points plus 6 temporary Hit Points per level you have, as well as a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round. The temporary Hit Points last until you refresh.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.6q9GQbouYB04o2G7]{Effect: Vital Touch (Living)}

An undead target takes @Damage[(6+(6*@actor.level))[vitality]] damage, with effects depending on your @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll}; this has the attack trait.

Critical Success The undead takes double damage and a –2 status penalty to AC for 2 rounds.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.VURae9MMbPOLWlNJ]{Effect: Vital Touch (Undead, Critical Success)}

Success The undead takes full damage and a –2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Failure Your touch barely grazes the undead. It takes only @Damage[(1+@actor.level)[vitality]] damage and a –1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.pqxqIqe8RpRLvAel]{Effect: Vital Touch (Undead)}

Critical Failure Your touch misses the undead completely. It has no effect.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 6, or by 1 on a failure.

Water Barrier.name: Water Barrier
Water Barrier.description: You surround yourself in water, providing you many of the protections of being underwater. Until the beginning of your next turn, bludgeoning and slashing attacks take a –2 circumstance penalty against you and you gain resistance equal to your level to acid and fire damage. You Refresh your powers, which allows you to change to your choice of high tide or low tide.

Water Curtain.name: Water Curtain
Water Curtain.description:
You trace a curtain of water across the battlefield, damaging foes and moving like a wave, pushing creatures along with it. You create a 5-foot thick curtain of water up to 10 feet high and up to @Template[type:line|distance:60]{60 feet long} in a straight line, calling forth the curtain within 120 feet. Any creature that crosses the curtain or is occupying the curtain's area at the start of its turn takes @Damage[(max((ceil(@actor.level/2)),6))d6[bludgeoning]] damage. The curtain lasts until you refresh.

A creature only takes bludgeoning damage and the reposition effect from Force Curtain once during each of its turns, even if it starts its turn in the curtain and then crosses the curtain, or crosses the curtain several times. While the curtain is greater difficult terrain for creatures without a swim Speed, it's thin enough that creatures can cross or exit the curtain as part of a Stride, without needing to Swim. Physical ranged attacks through the curtain take a –2 circumstance penalty, and creatures within or on the other side of the curtain gain resistance 5 to acid and fire attacks that need to enter or cross the curtain to reach them.

High Tide: At the end of your turn, you can choose to move the curtain up to 10 feet away from your initial position when you created it. If you do, creatures in the curtain, or who enter the curtain during its movement, move along with it.

Low Tide: At the end of your turn, you can choose to move the curtain up to 10 feet toward your initial position when you created it. If you do, creatures in the curtain, or who enter the curtain during its movement, move along with it.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Water Gaol.name: Water Gaol
Water Gaol.description:
You call forth a prison of water to immobilize and potentially drown your foe. Choose a foe within 60 feet. The target is affected depending on its @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

The gaol pops like a bubble if the target breaks free, and it otherwise lasts up to a maximum of 1 minute. While a foe is imprisoned in your water gaol, it's underwater and must hold its breath or begin suffocating unless it can breathe underwater. Additionally, the water gaol provides other @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.TPbr1kErAAJKBi3V]{effects} of being underwater: the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} unless it has a swim Speed, it gains acid and fire resistance 5, bludgeoning and slashing melee attacks it makes or that are made against it take a –2 circumstance penalty, bludgeoning and slashing ranged attacks it makes or that are made against it automatically miss, and it can't use fire spells or actions.

High Tide: At the start of each of the imprisoned creature's turns, they take @Damage[@actor.level[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power] damage from the high pressure. However, keeping up the pressure saps your strength. You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} while the gaol lasts. At the end of each of the imprisoned creature's turns, you can move the water gaol up to 30 feet away from you. This movement ignores their immobilized condition.

Low Tide: At the end of each of the imprisoned creature's turns, you can move the water gaol up to 30 feet toward you. This movement ignores their immobilized condition. You gain greater cover against the imprisoned creature.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is barely trapped in the water gaol, so escaping is easy. The target is immobilized until it either Escapes against your power DC or succeeds at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:10] check to Swim out of the gaol.

Failure The target is imprisoned completely within the gaol. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes against your power DC.

Critical Failure The target is imprisoned and transfixed by the water pressure. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the water gaol until it Escapes against your power DC.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1.

Weakening Field.name: Weakening Field
Weakening Field.description:
As you arrange death energy in a lattice around you, you recover your powers and create a weakening field to leach away your foes' strength. Foes within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] become enfeebled based on their @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save as long as they remain in the field. The field lasts until the end of your next turn. You Refresh your powers.

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} as long as they remain in the field.

Failure The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} as long as they remain in the field.

Critical Failure The foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} as long as they remain in the field.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description:
You surge forward and then spin winds around you, slicing into your foes. Stride and then you deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[slashing]] damage to all foes in an emanation with your choice of size up to 20 feet, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]

@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]

@Template[type:emanation|distance:15]

@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Wind Barrier.name: Wind Barrier
Wind Barrier.description:
You create a dome of wind around you as you refresh your air powers, scattering ranged attacks while you recover. For 1 round, physical ranged attacks against you or an ally within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] take a circumstance penalty depending on the size of the ranged weapon.

Attacks that use arrows, bolts, bullets, or similar ammunition take a –4 circumstance penalty, attacks with bigger ranged weapons, such as javelins, take a –2 circumstance penalty. Massive ranged weapons and spell effects that don't rely on physical objects pass through the winds with no penalty.

You Refresh your powers.

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.uERezG076DkjIoUt]{Effect: Wind Barrier}

Wind Cutter.name: Wind Cutter
Wind Cutter.description:
You launch a blade of wind that grow larger and larger as it moves from its origin point, cutting through all creatures in the way. You deal @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[slashing]] to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] with an origin point anywhere within 60 feet (rather than from your square like most cone effects), with a @Check[type:Reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] save.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Wind Rush.name: Wind Rush
Wind Rush.description:
You carry yourself through the air on a rush of wind and use the momentum to unleash a powerful slash on a foe. Stride up to two times and then make a @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll} against a foe within reach, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)d8[slashing]] damage.

Critical Success You deal double slashing damage.

Success You deal normal slashing damage.

Failure Your slash misses, but the nearby air current grazes the target, dealing @Damage[(2+@actor.level)[slashing]] damage.

Critical Failure The slash misses completely, and the target is unharmed.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8, or 1 on a failure.

Wintry Vortex.description:
You surround yourself in a shapeable wintry vortex of swirling sleet and deepest cold. You deal an amount of cold damage equal to @Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4 +ceil(@actor.level/2))[cold]] damage to all foes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], with results depending on their @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 2}.

Failure The creature takes full damage is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 3}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.OyojvmEKkLrUxX1W]{Frozen 4}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1.
Wintry Vortex.name: Wintry Vortex

Aeolus.name: 埃俄罗斯 Aeolus
Aeolus.description: 你从元素之风的源泉召唤出强大的气流，这些气流将你的盟友向前推进，并将你的敌人撕成碎片。气流在一条路径上吹动，路径宽度可达60英尺，长度可达1000英尺。你和区域内的盟友不会受到伤害，如果他们愿意，你可以将他们沿着路径的任何距离移动。区域内的敌人则会受到20d8的斩击伤害，需要进行一次基础反射豁免。@Template[type:line|distance:1000|width:60]{60 feet wide and up to 1,000 feet long}@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[slashing]] @Check[type:Reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

Ambush.name: 伏击 Ambush
Ambush.description:
你突然召唤出一丛意想不到的灌木，它从地面刺穿而出，提供掩护，并可能使他们失去平衡。在120英尺内一个15英尺×15英尺的正方形区域内的生物受到6d6穿刺伤害，需要进行一次基础反射豁免。 @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: 你在该区域内播种，创造出一丛灌木，只要它存在，就可以为你和你的盟友提供轻度掩护（但不会为你的敌人提供掩护）。如果你从这丛灌木中收割方格，区域内的敌人直到你下一个回合结束之前都会处于“措手不及”状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}
  • Harvest: 你在该区域内收割。除非敌人的豁免检定大成功，否则区域内的敌人直到你下一个回合结束之前都会处于“措手不及”状态。

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Amrita.name: 阿姆利塔 Amrita
Amrita.description:
你在濒死或最近死亡的生物身上滴下一滴超高浓度的液态生命能量，使它们能够体验到一丝不朽。选择一个30英尺内的活生物，或者一个在上一个回合内死亡的死生物。

该生物获得150生命值，如果它已死亡，则会复活，尽管阿姆利塔无法复活被消灭或死于死亡效果的生物。此外，尝试对影响该生物的每种毒素和疾病进行反制检定，使用你的威能DC-10作为抵消修正，以及你等级的一半（向上取整）作为反制等级。@Damage[150[healing]]

如果你以这种方式未能移除一种疾病，该疾病将在24小时内对阿姆利塔免疫。

Anansi.name: 阿南西 Anansi
Anansi.description:
模仿一位神话中的编织者和诡计者的技巧，你在各处交织着力场之线，对你的敌人造成毁灭性打击，并像操纵木偶一样在你周围移动所有人。这些力线在你周围形成一个200英尺的散发区域。你可以移动散发区域内的愿意的盟友，距离可达80英尺，且他们不会受到力线的伤害。@Template[type:emanation|distance:200]

另一方面，你对区域内的敌人造成20d6的力场伤害，具体结果取决于他们的基础强韧豁免。 @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[force]]@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and you can reposition them up to 10 feet.

Failure The creature takes full damage and you can reposition them up to 20 feet.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and you can reposition them up to 40 feet.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Auto-Petrification.name: 自动石化 Auto-Petrification
Auto-Petrification.description: 你将自己转化为一座极为坚硬的石像，与大地调频并刷新你的土系能力。直到你的下一个回合开始，你处于石化（Petrified）状态，但你的硬度（Hardness）等于你的等级的四倍，而不是普通的8点硬度。然而，由于你在石化状态下防御等级（AC）较低，敌人很可能会对你造成暴击。你刷新了你的能力。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified}

Billowing Terror.name: 汹涌恐怖 Billowing Terror
Billowing Terror.description:
你用纯粹的恐怖将自己包围，这种恐怖汹涌而出，使你的敌人陷入惊慌。20英尺范围内的敌人将受到14d6心灵伤害，具体效果取决于他们的意志豁免。@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[mental]] @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

Critical Success 敌人不受影响。

Success 敌人受到一半伤害，并且处于恐惧1（Frightened 1）状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure敌人受到全额伤害，并且处于恐惧2（Frightened 2）状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure敌人受到双倍伤害，并且处于恐惧3（Frightened 3）状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Blade of Light.name: 光之刃 Blade of Light
Blade of Light.description:
你召唤出一柄光之刃并刺向敌人，将他们笼罩在光芒中，并利用周围的光线为你提供优势。你对触及范围内的一个敌人造成3d8火焰伤害。具体结果取决于你的近战威能攻击投掷。如果目标处于光痕（Limned）状态，他们将对这次攻击处于措手不及（Off-Guard）状态。@Damage[(2+@actor.level)d8[fire]] @Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{melee power attack roll}. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}

Critical Success 你造成双倍火焰伤害，并且目标直到你的下一个回合结束时都处于光痕（Limned）和眩目（Dazzled）状态。@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}

Success 你造成正常的火焰伤害，并且目标直到你的下一个回合结束时都处于光痕状态。

Failure 你的光之刃未命中，但目标必须选择让攻击擦过他们或因光芒飞过眼睛而变得眩目。目标直到你的下一个回合结束时都处于光痕状态。此外，他们可以选择承受3点火焰伤害或直到你的下一个回合结束时处于眩目状态。@Damage[(2+@actor.level)[fire]]

Critical Failure 你的光之刃完全落空，目标未受到伤害。

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d8, or 1 on a failure.

Brainstorm.name: 头脑风暴 Brainstorm
Brainstorm.description:
你召唤出一场充满精神能量的风暴，它在某个区域内翻腾，如果你也在该区域内，你还可以窃取敌人的想法。头脑风暴会填满你周围60尺内一个20尺的爆发区域。进入或在该区域开始其回合的敌人会受到9d6心灵伤害，并且直到你下一个回合结束前处于呆滞1状态。@Template[type:burst|distance:20]@Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d6[mental]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}

如果你在某个敌人陷入呆滞状态时处于该区域内，你将窃取他们的想法，并获得+1状态加值，用于意志豁免、感知检定、心灵威能的攻击投掷，以及基于智力、感知和魅力的技能检定，直到你下一个回合结束。

每个生物在其回合中只会从头脑风暴中受到一次心灵伤害并陷入迟钝状态，即使它在该区域开始其回合，然后又进入该区域。这场风暴会持续到你再次刷新。

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.7NCjs0bdgx7gRmq4]{Effect: Brainstorm}

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Bubble Burst.name: 水泡爆裂 Bubble Burst
Bubble Burst.description:
你召唤出一个巨大的泡泡围绕在敌人周围，然后泡泡爆裂，将敌人向外推或向内拉。根据敌人反射豁免的不同，你对120尺内30尺爆发范围内的所有敌人造成8d4钝击伤害。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d4[bludgeoning]]@Template[type:burst|distance:30] @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

High Tide: 伤害变为8d8钝击伤害，但直到你下一个回合结束前，你的AC降低2。泡泡爆裂时，受影响的生物从爆发的中心向外移动。这是一种强迫移动。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[bludgeoning]|options:high-tide-power]

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.4jBsevZHp1D3WFFu]{Effect: Bubble Burst (High Tide)}

Low Tide: 该区域内敌人对你进行攻击检定时，受到-2环境减值，直到你下一个回合结束，除非他们豁免大成功。泡泡爆裂时，受影响的生物被移向爆发的中心。这是一种强迫移动。如果泡泡中心附近没有足够的空间，靠近中心的生物先移动，其他生物则尽可能地移动，但不会被阻挡，移动距离由他们的豁免结果决定。

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.eodo23kQ8nTVj5np]{Effect: Bubble Burst (Low Tide)}

Critical Success 敌人不受影响。

Success 敌人受到一半伤害，你将其移动5尺。

Failure 敌人受到全额伤害，你将其移动10尺。

Critical Failure 敌人受到双倍伤害，你将其移动20尺。

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4, or 1d8 on high tide.

Brilliant Raiment.name: 炫目华服 Brilliant Raiment
Brilliant Raiment.description:
你披上一件由耀眼光芒构成的华服，对附近的生物造成伤害，并在它们注视你时使它们目眩。你的闪耀华服对20尺范围内的所有生物造成6d4+3点火伤害，需要进行一次基础强韧豁免。@Damage[((1+@actor.level)d4+(ceil(@actor.level/2)))[fire]] @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

直到你下一个回合结束前，每当一个敌人试图对你进行攻击时，它在那次攻击中会处于目眩状态（目眩状态要求敌人进行常规的纯骰，但该状态不会持续到那次攻击之后）。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Level (+2) The damage increases by 1.

Death Pulse.name: 死亡脉冲 Death Pulse
Death Pulse.description:
你脉动着死亡能量，控制着距离以将破坏限制在周围环境。你对30尺散发范围内的所有生物造成6d6虚无伤害，需进行一次DC 0基础强韧豁免。该区域内的小植物（如草和蕨类）会枯萎死亡。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[void]] @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Deathly Chill.name: 死亡寒冰 Deathly Chill
Deathly Chill.description:
你将死亡的严寒注入敌人周围的冰霜中，使其逐渐失去温暖和生命。选择60尺内被你的冰威能冻结的一个敌人。在目标的每个回合结束时，其根据当前冻结值受到相应数量的d10伤害（例如，若当前冻结值为5，则在回合结束时受到5d10伤害）。此伤害不是持续伤害，不能像持续伤害那样被移除；它会持续到目标不再被冻结，此时效果结束。

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.GxeutBq3kooYKzH1]{Frozen (Deathly Chill)}

Effulgent Explosion.name: 耀光爆裂 Effulgent Explosion
Effulgent Explosion.description:
你在360尺范围内凝聚出一团30尺爆发的耀光能量，对区域内所有生物造成18d6火焰伤害，其效果取决于目标的反射豁免检定。@Template[type:burst|distance:30] @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[fire]] @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

Critical Success 目标不受影响。

Success 目标承受半数伤害，并获得1分钟【光痕】状态。@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.conditions.5tWqbv3Iu1FlrOx6]{Limned}

Failure 目标承受全额伤害，直至你的下回合结束陷入【目眩】状态，并获得10分钟【光痕】状态。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled}

Critical Failure 目标承受双倍伤害，直至你的下回合结束陷入【目眩】状态，并获得1小时【光痕】状态。

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Enfolding Roots.description:
你召唤出一片根须领域环绕自身，对敌人造成伤害，并通过播种或收割来获得掩护。对20尺弥漫范围内的所有敌人造成6d6穿刺伤害，具体效果取决于其基础反射豁免。@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d6[piercing]] @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: You sow within the area.
  • Harvest: 在区域内进行收割，将被收割的根须和植物转化为盘绕屏障，为你和盟友（不包括敌人）提供标准掩护，持续2轮。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Cover}

Level (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.
Enfolding Roots.name: 盘绕根须 Enfolding Roots

Entangling Vines.name: 缠结藤蔓 Entangling Vines
Entangling Vines.description:
你播种大范围的藤蔓，或通过收割来束缚敌人。

Choose to either sow or harvest.

  • Sow: 在120尺范围内，以某点为中心播种半径最大30尺的爆发区域。
  • Harvest: 在120尺范围内，以某点为中心收割半径最大30尺的爆发区域。被收割方格内的敌人必须尝试强韧豁免，效果如下：@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

Critical Success 目标不受影响

Success 目标速度受到-10尺环境减值，持续2轮或直到其通过对抗你威能DC的逃脱检定（以先发生者为准）

Failure 目标速度受到-20尺环境减值，持续2轮或直到其通过对抗你威能DC的逃脱检定（以先发生者为准）

Critical Failure 目标被禁足且速度受到-20尺环境减值。两个效果持续2轮或直到其通过对抗你威能DC的逃脱检定（以先发生者为准）@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.4rXXLUOJT0Uv56B5]{Effect: Entangling Vines}

@UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.effects.Item.1aKKXwItzYgOTRuH]{Effect: Entangling Vines (Failure)}

Enduring Verdure.name: 永恒青翠 Enduring Verdure
Enduring Verdure.description: 你小心翼翼地重新排列周围的木元素能量，确保不会干扰任何已播种的植物。你刷新你的威能，同时保留所有已播种的植物。若之后以其他方式刷新（例如战斗结束时自动刷新），这些植物仍会消失。

Explode Corpse.name: 尸爆术 Explode Corpse
Explode Corpse.description:
你将死亡能量注入一个生物的体内，使其从内部膨胀并在死亡时爆炸。选择一个60英尺内的生物。目标受到@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[void]]伤害，并进行一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]豁免检定。如果这次伤害将目标的生命值降至0，目标会爆炸，对所选半径（最大30英尺）范围内的所有生物造成相同伤害，并进行一次基础反射豁免。

因爆炸而死亡的生物会以同样的方式继续爆炸，但即使一个生物处于多次爆炸的范围内，他们只会受到一次“尸体爆炸”的伤害。

等级（+1） 伤害增加1d8。

Entrench.name: 扎根 Entrench
Entrench.description:
Requirements 你站在坚实的表面上

你将自身深扎入地面并固定不动，使敌人难以移动你或从你身边通过。你获得禁足状态，并在对抗试图移动你的效果的豁免和DC上获得+4状态加值。对于此类效果，扎根会尝试进行一次反制检定，反制调整值等于你的威能DC-10，反制等级等于你等级的一半（向上取整）。@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}

此外，你触及范围内的所有方格对你的敌人而言均为困难地形。当敌人在移动期间从你触及范围外的方格进入你触及范围内时，必须成功通过一次对抗你威能DC的强韧豁免，否则其移动立即结束。@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]

这些效果持续至你刷新、不再处于禁足状态、移动、或选择以一个自由动作主动结束（以先发生者为准）。

Exploding Bulwark.name: 爆炸壁垒 Exploding Bulwark
Exploding Bulwark.description:
你用岩石壁垒包围自己，准备爆炸，寻找附近的敌人，除非他们先将其击碎。当你使用爆炸壁垒时，选择20英尺内的任意数量的敌人，同时岩石壁垒会在你的身体上生长。

你从岩石壁垒中获得+4环境加值到AC，直到你的下一回合开始，此时壁垒爆炸，释放出无数石块，寻找并打击选定的敌人，如果他们在60英尺范围内，造成@Damage[(-3+@actor.level)d10[钝击]]伤害，敌人需要进行@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]豁免检定。

然而，在你的下一回合之前，每当有生物对你进行打击时，除非打击是严重失败，否则爆炸壁垒提供的AC环境加值减少1，爆炸伤害减少1d10，最低为+0 AC和减少4个骰子的伤害。

注意：显示的伤害假设没有剩余的AC加值。请应用以下效果计算伤害。

等级（+1）伤害增加1d10。

Explosion.name: 爆炸 Explosion
Explosion.description:
你使一个燃烧的生物自发爆炸，对其自身和周围的一切造成爆炸性伤害。选择一个60英尺内受到持续火焰伤害的生物。目标爆炸，受到@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d10[fire]]伤害，并进行一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]豁免。

你可以选择爆炸的范围，最小5英尺，最大30英尺。范围内的其他生物受到目标伤害的一半（在应用目标的豁免、抗力、弱点等之前），并进行一次@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]豁免。

等级 (+1) 伤害增加1d10。

Exterminate.name: 消灭 Exterminate
Exterminate.description:
你消灭周围所有的弱者。所有在你周围 @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] 范围内的敌人要么立即死亡，要么受到 @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[void]] 伤害，具体取决于他们的 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)] 豁免检定。

大成功 敌人的生命无法如此轻易被消灭。敌人不受你的“消灭”影响。

成功 敌人抵挡了部分消灭效果，但如果它特别脆弱，仍可能死亡。如果敌人是活物且生命值少于 [[(5* ceil(@actor.level/2))]]（每两级你有5点生命值，向上取整），它将立即死亡。否则，它受到一半伤害。

失败 你消灭了敌人。如果敌人是活物且生命值少于 [[(5+(5*@actor.level))]]（5点加上每级5点生命值），它将立即死亡。否则，它受到全额伤害。

大失败 你彻底消灭了敌人。如果敌人是活物且生命值少于 [[(10+(10*@actor.level))]]（10点加上每级10点生命值），它将立即死亡。否则，它受到双倍伤害。

等级（+1） 伤害增加1d8。

Fatal Weakness.name: 致命弱点 Fatal Weakness
Fatal Weakness.description:
你吸取一个生物的生命力，同时削弱它的力量。选择一个60英尺内的生物。它受到@Damage[ceil(@actor.level/2)d6[void]]伤害，并根据其@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)]豁免结果变得虚弱。

大成功 生物的生命力过于强大，无法被吸取，生物不受影响。

成功 你短暂地削弱了生物。它受到一半伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{虚弱2}持续1轮。

失败 你极大地削弱了生物，并产生持续效果。它受到全额伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{虚弱3}持续1轮，以及虚弱1持续1分钟。

大失败 你吸取了生物的大部分力量。它受到双倍伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{虚弱4}持续1轮，以及虚弱2持续1分钟。

等级（+2） 伤害增加1d6。

Final Harvest.name: 最终收割 Final Harvest
Final Harvest.description:
你收割你播种在你周围的广阔区域内的植物。你必须收割。当你这样做时，你可以收割你选择收割的范围内 @Template[type:emanation|distance:200] 内的任何植物。此能力无法收割其他植物。被收割植物区域内的敌人会受到 @Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[piercing]] 点伤害，需进行一次 @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true] 豁免。

等级 (+1) 伤害增加 1d8。

Fire Arrow.name: 火焰箭 Fire Arrow
Fire Arrow.description:
你射出一支纯火焰之箭，将敌人化为灰烬。对60英尺内的敌人进行一次@Check[type:eldamon-power-attack|defense:ac]{远程能量攻击检定}，造成@Damage[(2+@actor.level)d6[火焰],(1+(floor(@actor.level/2)))[持续,火焰]]伤害。在7级时，以及之后每4级，你的火焰箭射程增加30英尺，19级时最大射程为180英尺。

大成功 你对目标造成双倍火焰伤害。

成功 你对目标造成正常火焰伤害。

失败 箭矢从目标身边掠过，但余烬仍将其点燃，造成@Damage[(floor((1+(floor(@actor.level/2)))/2))[持续,火焰]]伤害。

大失败 箭矢未命中，不造成伤害。

等级 (+1) 伤害增加1d6。

等级 (+2) 持续伤害增加1点。

Fire Breath.name: 火焰吐息 Fire Breath
Fire Breath.description:
你像红龙一样呼出一片巨大的火焰锥，将敌人化为灰烬。你可以选择锥形范围的大小，从@Template[type:cone|distance:15]到@Template[type:cone|distance:80]。如果你花费三个动作，可以将锥形范围扩大到@Template[type:cone|distance:120]。

范围内的生物受到@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d8[fire]]点火焰伤害，并需要进行一次@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]豁免检定。

等级（+1） 伤害增加1d8。

Fire Trap.name: 火焰陷阱 Fire Trap
Fire Trap.description:
你在地面上放置一个燃烧陷阱，第一个踩到它的生物将遭遇火焰的毁灭。选择一个60英尺内的5英尺方格。第一个进入所选方格的生物，以及该方格周围5英尺范围内的所有其他生物，将受到@Damage[(1+@actor.level)d12[fire]]点火焰伤害，并需要进行一次@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.proficiencies.classDCs.eldamon.dc)|basic:true]反射豁免。
